ability.Reckless Power: Increases the power of all moves by 30% but the user takes recoil damage equal to 15% of the damage dealt.
ability.Unstable Energy: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to become confused at the end of each turn.

Explosive Beam.effect: Deals damage to the target and has a 30% chance to burn it.

Trample.effect: Deals damage to the target and has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Dragon Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
